name: Dungeon Travelers 2: The Royal Library & The Monster Seal
name_original: Dungeon Travelers 2: The Royal Library & The Monster Seal
description:
The kingdom of Romulea is overrun by monsters! You are Fried, an adventurer tasked by the Royal Library to stop these monsters. Traveling through dungeons alone is no fun, so make sure to recruit from the 16 different heroines willing to join you on your quest! Each heroine can be assigned subclasses, and from there branch into even more powerful classes. Form your strategies around those team members, as that will be key to winning your battles!
Dangers lurk around every corner. Normal fruit-shaped monsters are a cinch, but how will you fare against the more powerful monster girls? Defeat them in battle and you’ll get to seal them away in a book. However, these books are more than they seem, as they take on the special properties of the sealed monster and boosts up your whole party! Collect all the books to survive. But don’t forget the essentials of dungeon traveling: strategy, heroines in your travel party, and monster girls ready to be sealed into books.
1 player(s)
2048KB Minimum

This item may be solely used on up to 2 PlayStation® systems activated by this account, with no more than 1 activated device within a 24 hour period.  Content may not be used by any other account.  Please see software description for device compatibility.
